short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kind Search customizes your search engines so you can plant trees with every search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension makes your search engine kind! Now, when you search, you'll see icons of more than 1000 partner brands on search result pages. When you buy from these brands, a portion of the profit goes to planting trees.

Here's how it works:

1. Kind Search adds small banners to Google, Bing, Yahoo, DuckDuckGo, and Yandex search result pages to indicate more than 1000 partner brands.

2. When you purchase from these brands, a portion of the revenue is allocated as forest planting support.

3. We fight deforestation and provide monthly financial statements to disclose all expenditures.

You can see the number of Kind Points you have at the bottom of the browser, which represents the number of trees you've planted with Kind Search. The more active your browsing activity is, the more trees we plant. The equivalent of one new tree is about 100 Kind Points. 

In Kind Search, your anonymized browsing activity is used to estimate your Kind Points.

By using Kind Search, you can help tackle climate change. Let's protect our planet together.
